title: Instead Of Snow Days, Time Off For Sandstorms, Volcanoes And More
teaser: What do children in other countries get days off for? Kavitha Cardoza brings stories from Saudi Arabia, the Philippines, Ecuador and India.
contentencoded:
Many children across the country have been thrilled to have a few days off school because of the snow days this winter. That got Kavitha Cardoza from Here & Now contributor WAMU wondering, what do children in other countries get days off for?

Reporter

  • Kavitha Cardoza, special correspondent for WAMU. She tweets @KavithaCardoza.
